name: Google - RCompact (BUGGED ON FIREFOX)
description: A cleaner, more compact search. Tested on: » Google Chrome / Windows XP (1280x800) & (1680x1050) » DOES NOT WORK ON FIREFOX 3.6!! No idea why... but will fix ASAP = =||| Original style: style 24103 «What it does» Removes: Google logo Search results count Search settings button Grey background behind original search/logo News & "sub" results Merges search bar with navigation bar Shrinks width of search bar Merges sign-in button with navigation bar Removes search & sign-in background Search button color change to fit navigation bar Search bar opacity set to 95% Pins the whole navigation/search bar to top Pins left navigation Adds a small grey border on the bottom of top bar
